name: There is no Fall in Malaysia
name_original: There is no Fall in Malaysia
description:
My first game jam!

There isn't any fall at the start, as it comes in the later levels. Sorry about that!

A simple platformer game made in Pygame. Thanks to AllenOoperman for letting me use some amazing songs for the soundtrack!

You can check his SoundCloud here:  https://soundcloud.com/allenopperman

You can also check my Yt?: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh8oQ8aJuIdMS1SQSTJHiqQ

Mechanics:

  • Charge up jump
  • Wall jump
  • That's about it sry I think I procrastinated a bit much

Movement:

  • A, D to move
  • SPACE to jump

Enjoy!
